0.Subtitle: THE OCEANS ABSORB AROUND 30% OF THE CARBON DIOXIDE (CO2) THAT IS RELEASED INTO THE ATMOSPHERE

8.Subtitle:
SINCE 1860, THE OCEANS’ PH HAS FALLEN BY 0.1 PH UNITS,
FROM 8.2 PH TO 8.1 PH

17.Subtitle:
WHAT SEEMS LIKE A SMALL CHANGE OF 0.1 ACTUALLY MEANS THAT
TODAY THE OCEANS ARE 30% MORE ACIDIC

25.Subtitle:
IN HUMANS, A DROP OF 0.1 PH UNITS IN THE BLOOD CAN RESULT IN
SEIZURES, COMA OR EVEN DEATH

32.Subtitle:
IF WE CONTINUE AT THIS PACE,
BY 2100 THE OCEANS WILL BE 170% MORE ACIDIC,
FALLING TO A PH OF AROUND 7.6

41.Subtitle: LET’S CONSIDER THE HUGE CONSEQUENCES: OCEAN ACIDIFICATION CAN PRECIPITATE ECOLOGICAL COLLAPSE

47.Subtitle: RESEARCH HAS SHOWN THAT A DROP IN PH OF 0.25 WAS ENOUGH TO PRECIPITATE ANOTHER MASS EXTINCTION 66 MILLION YEARS AGO

55.Subtitle: AND IT WAS HUNDREDS OF THOUSANDS OF YEARS BEFORE LIFE RETURNED TO NORMAL
